cab.content: ECHET,P,1I9(23'C A S ijs E T1S&PROPOSED ADVISORY FINE ARTS CQHLIIgSION ' -Note by the Secretary,A Licmorandum by the late First Commis?loner of v;orks on the above subject is on the Agenda for the Cabinet meeting on Wednesday, 21st February,1923, It is perhaps desirable to o-plain that the present First Commissioner of Forks wrote on December 6th, 1922 expressing a desiro that this Memorandum should stand in his name for consideration by the Cabinet as he was entirely in sympathy with the proposal and fully endorsed Lord Crawford's views.(Sgd.) Ms P.A.Hankey,Secretary, Cabinet.2, Whitehall Gardens, S;",/l 20th February, 1923
